name: Froggo The Frog
description:
🐸 Welcome to Froggo the Frog 🐸

Compete against players around the world in this 3D platformer game by submitting your highest score after beating all three levels.

GET TO THE JUKEBOX!! 🎶

W, A, S, D to move and SPACEBAR to jump; 

Hold left click to use your tongue and swing;

Pass through the hoops and collect the flies;

Do it as fast as possible;

ESCAPE to pause (twice on web);

Press M to change the current music;

Shift+R to restart the current level;

FEATURES:

Tongue-swinging-action like spider-man;

Speedrunning elements; 

Collectables;

Leaderboard system;

Feel free to record and share your gameplay with us!

Made for olc::BeatTheBoredom game jam.
